item.title: EBAY
item.description: score:92 Chances: The appointment of Zane Rowe to eBay’s Board of Directors signifies a commitment to strengthening governance and oversight. eBay’s suite of mobile apps and localized platforms in South Korea, Japan, and Turkey provide strong growth opportunities. The company’s focus on enabling sellers to offer their inventory virtually anytime and anywhere has the potential to drive revenue growth.
